name: Public Relations
desc: To inform ICS Students of the latest events happening in the school.

name: Projects
desc: To develop projects for the council, other student associations, the Bren administration, UCI, and corporations.

name: Events
desc: To plan and host events that will benefit ICS Students academically, professionally, and socially.

name: Corporate Outreach
desc: To create and maintain connections with corporations and alumni to gather support for ICSSC events.

name: Alumni and Academic Affairs
desc: To connect Alumni and Professors with ICS students to provide guidance in their academic and professional journey.
